title: News24.com | Police question Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams, meet with NPA over lockdown breach - Cele
description: Police Minister Bheki Cele says police officers looking into the case against Communications Minister Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams have already spoken to the National Prosecuting Authority.
content:
Investigating officers looking into the case against Communications Minister Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams have already spoken to the National Prosecuting Authority, Police Minister Bheki Cele said on Friday.
Cele said the investigating officer had already met wit… [+1385 chars]
